# kCLLocationAccuracyBest

**Global Variable**

The best level of accuracy available.

## Declaration

```swift
let kCLLocationAccuracyBest: CLLocationAccuracy
```

## Discussion

Specify this constant when you want very high accuracy but don’t need the same level of accuracy required for navigation apps.

This level of accurate is available only if `isAuthorizedForPreciseLocation` is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Desired Accuracy Constants

- **kCLLocationAccuracyBestForNavigation**: The highest possible accuracy that uses additional sensor data to facilitate navigation apps.
- **kCLLocationAccuracyNearestTenMeters**: Accurate to within ten meters of the desired target.
- **kCLLocationAccuracyHundredMeters**: Accurate to within one hundred meters.
- **kCLLocationAccuracyKilometer**: Accurate to the nearest kilometer.
- **kCLLocationAccuracyThreeKilometers**: Accurate to the nearest three kilometers.
- **kCLLocationAccuracyReduced**: The level of accuracy used when an app isn’t authorized for full accuracy location data.
